com.opencredo.concourse.domain.events.history

Class EventHistoryFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opencredo.concourse.domain.events.history.EventHistoryFetcher

  • public final class EventHistoryFetcher
extends Object
    Fetches the event history of one or more aggregates.

      • getHistories

        public Map<UUID,List<Event>> getHistories(EventSource eventSource,
                                          Collection<UUID> aggregateIds)
        Get the Event histories for multiple aggregates.
        Parameters:
        eventSource - The EventSource to get the event histories from.
        aggregateIds - The ids of the aggregates to get event histories for.
        Returns:
        The event histories for the requested aggregates, grouped by aggregate id.
